definitions.definition: Any of a group of gram-negative bacteria , of the genus Rickettsia , carried as parasites by ticks , fleas and lice , that cause typhus and other diseases .
Any bacterium of the order Rickettsiales .

main_definition: Any of a group of gram-negative bacteria , of the genus Rickettsia , carried as parasites by ticks , fleas and lice , that cause typhus and other diseases .
secondary_definitions: ( informal ) Any bacterium of the order Rickettsiales .
